sentences.cn: 凡是正义的事业都是不可战胜的。

sentences.en: He also had an invincible faith in the medicinal virtues of garlic.
sentences.cn: 他同时也对大蒜的医学功效深信不疑。

sentences.en: I absolve you, on the ground of invincible ignorance.
sentences.cn: 鉴于你不可救药的无知,我原谅你.

sentences.en: It was as if she were invincible when Hurstwood helped her.
sentences.cn: 有赫斯渥帮她的忙,看来她是战无不胜的了.

sentences.en: Only by overcoming our weaknesses can we advance without any encumbrance; only by uniting ourselves in our struggle can we be invincible.
sentences.cn: 克服缺点才能轻装前进, 团结战斗才能无往不胜.

sentences.en: Reckoning only with Bat Div Seven types they might have been invincible.
sentences.cn: 如果需要与之周旋的单是战列舰第七分舰队那类型的军舰,那么它们可能是无敌的.

sentences.en: That football team was once reputed to be invincible.
sentences.cn: 那只橄榄球队曾被普遍认为是无往而不胜的.

sentences.en: The forces for peace, justice and progress are invincible after all.
sentences.cn: 和平的力量,正义的力量, 进步的力量,终究是不可战胜的.

sentences.en: The might of the army is "invincible," according to state media but the refugees are rather cynical about the ill equipped force.
sentences.cn: 朝鲜官方媒体称朝鲜的军事力量是“无敌的”，可是朝鲜难民却对装备落后的军队表示出不屑。

sentences.en: The people lined the street to hail the invincible general.
sentences.cn: 人们排列在街的两旁向常胜将军欢呼.
他们打起仗来战无不胜.

sentences.en: They took an invincible lead in the chase for the championship.
sentences.cn: 他们在冠军争夺赛中居于不可动摇的领先地位。

sentences.en: This football team was once reputed to be invincible.
sentences.cn: 这支足球队曾被誉为无敌的劲旅.

sentences.en: When Sotomayor is on form he is virtually invincible.
sentences.cn: 索托马约尔状态好时几乎无人可敌。

sentences.en: Young athletes think of themselves as invincible.
sentences.cn: 年轻的运动员自认为是战无不胜的。

trans.tran_cn: 不可战胜的，不能征服的，无敌的，无攻不克，无前
trans.tran_en: too strong to be destroyed or defeated
